description: Observations to the London Borough of Hackney in connection with the proposed redevelopment of the site comprising the construction of three inter-linked buildings ranging in height from six storeys to ten storeys to provide a mix of commercial (B1), retail (A1, A2, A3) units, 65 residential units including 23 affordable homes and 21 live/work units.
decision_conditions: INFORMATIVE:  Islington Council objects to the proposal as the size, height, scale and bulk of the new building are considered out of keeping with the proportions and form of the existing surrounding buildings and would have an adverse effect on the appearance of the street scene contrary to policy D1 of Islington Council's adopted Unitary Development plan (2002).
